casebody.data:
Gary DeFRANCES, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Edwin EDWARDS, etc., et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 77-3384. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Jan. 4, 1980. Gregorio & Frazier, Sam Gregorio, Shreveport, La., for plaintiff-appellant. William J. Guste, Jr., Atty. Gen., Baton Rouge, La., A. Mills McCawley, Asst. Atty. Gen., Shreveport, La., Carmack M. Black-mon, Asst. Atty. Gen., Baton Rouge, La., for defendants-appellees.

Before AINSWORTH, INGRAHAM and GARZA, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Having reviewed the record, briefs and oral arguments, we are in agreement with the judgment and reasoning of the district court and accordingly affirm on the basis of its opinion, 480 F.Supp. 1 (W.D.La.1979).

AFFIRMED.
